means: 摇摆，摇晃，动摇( waver的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He told wavering colleagues the country must back the Government's stance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他告诉那些犹豫不决的同僚们，国家必须支持政府的立场。
那些俄国人明显在犹豫。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Bai3 | 法汉字典 ... 两百亿 twenty billion 摇摆不定 indecisive;wavering 摆满 to spread over an area.

list.abs: But this did not make them waver or retreat ., 但这并没有使他们动摇或退缩.
marbleized soap 大理石花纹皂marcel waver 美发器marceline 马瑟林绸
As I opened the window , the flame wavered and then went out ., 当我打开窗户时 , 火焰摇曳 , 接着就熄灭了.
vi. 摇摆wavering shadows 摇曳的阴影vi. 犹豫不决，动摇

entry.def: If you waver, you cannot decide about something or you consider changing your mind about something.

example.ex: Some military commanders wavered over whether to support the coup...
example.tran: 军队的一些指挥官在犹豫是否支持政变。

example.ex: Coleman has never wavered in his claim that he is innocent...
example.tran: 科尔曼坚称他是无辜的。

entry.def: If something wavers, it shakes with very slight movements or changes.

example.ex: The shadows of the dancers wavered continually...
example.tran: 舞者的身影在轻轻晃动着。

example.ex: This time his voice wavered badly...

means.word_mean: 2. the quality of being unsteady and subject to fluctuations;

sentences.sentence: "he kept a record of price fluctuations"

auth_sentence.content: But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering.
auth_sentence.res_content: But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering.

auth_sentence.content: Even pillars of the business community are wavering.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even pillars of the business community are wavering.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even pillars of the business community are wavering.

auth_sentence.content: Brent geese fly in long low wavering lines.
auth_sentence.res_content: Brent geese fly in long low wavering lines.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Brent geese fly in long low wavering lines.
